app.title: Suno - AI Music & Songs
app.description:
Make any song you can imagine with Suno, an AI music studio right in your pocket.

We offer the following features:
• Make songs from text description and prompts
• Uplevel your song with personalized lyrics
• Discover and follow new artists
• Curate your own playlists

Get started with 10 free songs (50 free credits) per day, or subscribe to make more music.

Your subscription will be charged to your Google Play Account upon purchase and will automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You cannot cancel during the active period, but you can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Google Play Account Settings.

TERMS & CONDITIONS

• Our Privacy Policy: https://suno.com/privacy
• Our Terms of Service: https://suno.com/terms

reviews.text: This AI app is pretty awesome! Me and my husband really love being able to make music! It's a great creative space! We have not gotten bass voices, or lower music yet. But that's only one of the potential negative things we have found so far. He has the pro, I have the regular, both of us love all the songs we have made!

Ya know, I didn't have high hopes with this app but I actually have made around 8 songs that I absolutely love. The AI nailed it. Tickle me impressed. Best feature? 20 free songs which seem like it's daily! You really get a good trial. I am thinking about subscribing and creating songs for my animation videos ☺️

It was able to generate some pretty badass music for my drone videos. The newer 4.5 model definitely makes better music than the older free ones, it has a fairly real sound when it comes to metal and guitar riffs. Whether that's worth the money to you I can't really say. For me I think it was worth it to make some pretty awesome instrumental music for my videos.

this is a really fun app. I got it in March (about 3 weeks ago). Since having got it, they "upgraded" it, but really, the vocals seem more auto-tunish, and the music is more muddy. It was much cleaner sounding before. Also, idk, but I was able to toggle between v3.5 and v4, but now I can't. I use it with my kids and we make silly songs and they love hearing about themselves in songs. There is a lot to discover still, I know. But I wanted to express my disappointment and gratitude.

Greatest. Music. App. Ever. Seriously, I saw a YouTuber use this app for their content in a few videos, and I was inspired to make some music myself. I tried it, and I was in awe. Literally makes bangers that I never expected from an AI. Only complaint is the free credit use. If you don't have a subscription (or premium) then you get free credits, no problem. Yes problem. I only will generate one song a day, and you get 10 credits every day. So not being able to make a song for no reason is a no

Impressive, but the App needs some work. First off, wow! The vocals, the instrumentals, the structure, the effects, it's all insanely impressive and realistic. Sometimes, the vocals sound a little off and robotic, but not very often. The app compared to the website is subpar. There is no search option, and when you go to a genre of music, you get maybe 10 songs before you reach the end. Also, I believe there should be an option to filter by language, too many songs are not in English.

wonderful app, I truly love it! for those who don't have access to learning how to learn a instrument or make music this is perfect! no adds, doesn't glitch, great quality music! multilingual too. yeah it sucks not being able to make a ton a songs if you can't have the subscription, but it's good enough. Edit: I do suggest a search bar to find songs and other profiles, and the same edit options for the songs like changing display lyrics on the website. Overall I do recommend.

I originally gave this app 5 stars, BUT... it's not as user-friendly as I originally thought. You can't edit the songs without losing the original music. When I "reuse style " on a song, it gives me a totally different sound! Some of the singing sounds choppy, and the songs are often cut off before finishing. Please, please fix the glitches - I don't want to download a different app to replace this.

Overall, an absolutely solid AI music generator. I wish there was a better way to communicate change / wish list requests. The ability for the program to produce great music is definitely leading in this field. I have tried a few other services, and they do not have the bells and whistles that this program does. All that being said, I would highly recommend this service.

Constantly says create due to internal error, try again in a few seconds. Sometimes it works, sometimes it don't. Makes very good music though. (Edit) Now does not work at all. Still have been only able to make two songs. Not sure if I want to pay a subscription for it, because what if it still won't work. Contacted support, only got an email saying that they are swamped with emails and to check out their articles and discord. Articles don't talk about error and don't really want to use discord.

app.developerLegalAddress: 17 Dunster St Ste 400, Cambridge, MA 02138, United States
app.AIReview:
Suno - AI Music & Songs Review

Overview

Suno – AI Music & Songs has rapidly become one of the most downloaded and highly rated apps in the music creation space. With over 14 million installs and a robust average rating of 4.79, it’s clear that this app is capturing the imagination (and ears) of users globally. At its core, Suno presents itself as an AI music studio accessible directly from your mobile device, allowing users to generate original songs based on text prompts – essentially turning ideas into auditory reality. The app's premise is straightforward: input a description or lyric idea, and Suno’s sophisticated AI algorithms will craft a unique musical piece tailored to that request. The free tier offers a generous starting point, making it an accessible entry point for those curious about AI-generated music while subscription options unlock greater creative control and output.

Key Features

Suno’s feature set is centered around its core AI song generation engine, but extends beyond simple creation with several compelling additions:

  • Text-to-Song Generation: This is the flagship feature. Users can input detailed prompts – ranging from broad concepts like “upbeat pop song about a sunset” to more specific requests including genre, mood, instrumentation, and even desired lyrical themes. The app’s algorithm then generates a complete musical piece based on this input.
  • Personalized Lyrics: Beyond simply generating the music, Suno allows users to refine their creations with personalized lyrics. This feature lets you tweak generated verses or choruses to better align with your initial prompt or artistic vision.
  • Artist Discovery & Following: The app includes a curated discovery section where users can find and follow new artists whose styles resonate with them. While the selection is still relatively small, it offers a degree of inspiration and highlights emerging talent within the Suno ecosystem.
  • Playlist Curation: Users can create and manage their own playlists, saving favorite generated songs for later listening or organization. This functionality adds a layer of personalization beyond just individual song creation.
  • Daily Credit Allocation: A generous starting point is offered with 10 free songs (50 free credits) per day, encouraging exploration and demonstrating the app's capabilities.
  • Subscription Model: For users seeking expanded creative options, Suno provides a tiered subscription model offering increased credit allocations, access to premium instruments/sounds, and priority processing.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to Suno’s impressive success:

  • Ease of Use: The app’s user interface is remarkably intuitive. The text-to-song generation process is incredibly simple – users just type in their prompt and hit “generate.” This accessibility broadens the potential audience for AI music creation significantly.
  • Surprisingly Good Results: Despite being an AI, Suno frequently produces surprisingly high-quality musical outputs. The generated tracks often have recognizable structures, varied instrumentation, and a degree of stylistic nuance that’s genuinely impressive. The quality varies depending on prompt complexity, but even simple prompts can yield satisfying results.
  • Constant Updates & Improvements: The rapid growth in installs (14,256,972) indicates an active development team constantly refining the algorithm and adding new features based on user feedback – a critical factor for maintaining engagement.
  • Large User Base & Community: The massive install base creates a thriving community where users share prompts, discuss techniques, and generally support each other's creative endeavors.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Suno has areas ripe for improvement:

  • Prompt Sensitivity: The app can be quite sensitive to prompt phrasing. Subtle changes in wording can dramatically alter the output. More robust prompt engineering guidance would be hugely beneficial.
  • Limited Control over Specific Elements: While personalized lyrics are a welcome addition, users have limited control over granular elements like specific drum patterns or basslines during generation. Expanding this control could unlock even more creative possibilities.
  • Credit System Can Be Frustrating: The daily credit limit can be frustrating for serious creators who want to experiment extensively. Offering larger credit bundles at a higher price point would address this concern.
  • Output Consistency: While generally good, the quality of generated music isn’t always consistent. Some songs feel rushed or lack a cohesive flow, highlighting an area where the AI still needs refinement.

User Experience

The user experience is overwhelmingly positive. The interface is clean, modern, and visually appealing. Generating a song takes mere seconds, offering immediate gratification. Navigation is intuitive, allowing users to quickly access different features like prompt creation, playlist management, and artist discovery. The app’s responsiveness is excellent – there are no noticeable lags or delays. The onboarding process is seamless, guiding new users through the basics without feeling overwhelming.

Value for Money

The free tier provides a fantastic entry point for exploring Suno's capabilities. However, to truly unlock its potential and generate a significant number of songs, subscribing is highly recommended. The subscription model offers a compelling value proposition, especially considering the quality of music generated. Pricing tiers are competitive within the AI music generation market.

Conclusion

Suno – AI Music & Songs represents a significant leap forward in accessible music creation technology. Its intuitive interface, surprisingly good output quality, and active development team make it a standout app in its category. While refinements could further enhance the user experience and expand creative control, Suno’s current state is genuinely impressive. It's an excellent tool for musicians of all levels, from casual hobbyists to aspiring producers seeking new methods for generating musical ideas. With its massive install base and continued development, Suno is poised to remain a dominant force in the burgeoning field of AI-powered music creation – highly recommended for anyone interested in exploring this innovative technology.
